name: A Lack of ForeSight
description:
"You wake up on the first floor of bleak dungeon. How you got there or what you are supposed to do alludes you. You feel a calling from something far below, a compulsion to seek it out. They only way is down…"

In A Lake of ForeSight you play a cute slime character with mechanised legs to help him get around. Your task is to venture down into the dungeon you find yourself in, and discover what lies bellow the surface.

On your way down you will encounter your fallen comrades, slimes that ventured into the depths before you, and lost the way in the dark. Now driven insane, their sole goal in life is to stop you from reaching what lies at the bottom of the dungeon...
